snippet: As waiting lists grow and become more and more competitive, students across the country are finding new ways to gain an edge and get their names in front of admissions officers, even going as far as recording YouTube videos pleading their case...
lead_paragraph: As waiting lists grow and become more and more competitive, students across the country are finding new ways to gain an edge and get their names in front of admissions officers, even going as far as recording YouTube videos pleading their case through song, dance and more.

headline.main: On Camera to Get Off the Waiting List
